source.85cc99fc: **A Dask dataFrame is a large parallel dataFrame composed of many smaller Pandas DataFrames, split along the index. These Pandas DataFrames may live on disk for larger-than-memory computing on a single machine, or on many different machines in a cluster. One Dask dataFrame operation triggers many operations on the constituent Pandas DataFrames.**
